languages.text: {n}Когда пыль рассеивается, вы видите знакомый зал. Взирая на вас из полутьмы, глаза скомороха мечут искры. За ним — клеть, в которой сидите вы — точнее, ваше тело. Ваше лицо залито слезами, губа разбита, а рядом валяется вокс. Из-за прутьев по соседству на истинного губернатора Тассеры мрачно смотрит Соломон. Завидев вас с Глейто, проктор подбирается. Кажется, он только и ждал вашего возвращения. Не сводя с вас пристального взгляда, он медленно кивает: к бою готов.{/n}
languages.translation_comment: Пати вместе с РТ в теле Мейв входит в зал церемоний.

traits.locale_text: {n}Когда пыль рассеивается, вы видите знакомый зал. Скоморох испуганно скрючился недалеко от клети, в которой сидите вы — точнее, ваше тело. Ваше лицо залито слезами, губа разбита, а рядом валяется вокс. Из-за прутьев по соседству на истинного губернатора Тассеры мрачно смотрит Соломон. Завидев вас с Глейто, проктор подбирается. Кажется, он только и ждал вашего возвращения. Не сводя с вас пристального взгляда, он медленно кивает: к бою готов.{/n}

languages.translation_comment: Пати вместе с РТ в теле Мейв входит в зал церемоний.

languages.text: {n}When the dust clears, you see the familiar hall. From the shadows, the jester's eyes spark with malice as they meet yours. Behind him stands a cage, in which you, or rather your body, is sitting. Your face is awash with tears, your lip is split, and a vox lies next to you. In another cage to the side stands Solomorne, glaring through the bars at the true governor of Thassera. Upon seeing you and Glaito, the Proctor straightens. It seems he was just waiting for your return. Without taking his intent gaze off you, he gives you a slow nod: he is ready to fight.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Когда пыль рассеивается, вы видите знакомый зал. Взирая на вас из полутьмы, глаза скомороха мечут искры. За ним — клеть, в которой сидите вы — точнее, ваше тело. Ваше лицо залито слезами, губа разбита, а рядом валяется вокс. Из-за прутьев по соседству на истинного губернатора Тассеры мрачно смотрит Соломон. Завидев вас с Глейто, проктор подбирается. Кажется, он только и ждал вашего возвращения. Не сводя с вас пристального взгляда, он медленно кивает: к бою готов.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}When the dust clears, you see the familiar hall. From the shadows, the jester's eyes spark with malice as they meet yours. Behind him stands a cage, in which you, or rather your body, is sitting. Your face is awash with tears, your lip is split, and a vox lies next to you. In a cage to the side stands Solomorne, glaring through the bars at the true governor of Thassera. Upon seeing you and Glaito, the Proctor straightens. It seems he was just waiting for your return. Without taking his intent gaze from you, he gives you a slow nod: he is ready to fight.{/n}

{n}The hall has not changed a bit since you left. The jester stands next to a cage where you, or rather your body, is reclining. From behind the bars beside it, Solomorne is glaring at the true Governor of Thassera. Upon seeing you and Glaito, the Proctor pulls up and nods. He seems to have been waiting for your return.{/n}

languages.text: {n}灰尘散去之后，你又看到了这间熟悉的大厅。小丑站在阴影之中，死死地盯着你的双眼，目光中充满了恶意。他身后摆着一个笼子，而你，或者更确切地说，你的肉体，正坐在笼子里。“你”的脸上满是泪水，嘴唇也裂开了，身边摆着一个通讯器。索罗蒙被关在旁边的笼子里，他的目光透过铁窗，对塔瑟拉真正的总督怒目而视。当你和格雷托出现时，索罗蒙挺直了腰杆，仿佛一直在等着你回来。他的目光专注地盯着你，慢慢点了点头——他已经做好战斗准备了。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}When the dust clears, you see the familiar hall. From the shadows, the jester's eyes spark with malice as they meet yours. Behind him stands a cage, in which you, or rather your body, is sitting. Your face is awash with tears, your lip is split, and a vox lies next to you. In another cage to the side stands Solomorne, glaring through the bars at the true governor of Thassera. Upon seeing you and Glaito, the Proctor straightens. It seems he was just waiting for your return. Without taking his intent gaze off you, he gives you a slow nod: he is ready to fight.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}灰尘散去之后，你又看到了这间熟悉的大厅。小丑站在阴影之中，死死地盯着你的双眼，目光中充满了恶意。他身后摆着一个笼子，而你，或者更确切地说，你的肉体，正坐在笼子里。“你”的脸上满是泪水，嘴唇也裂开了，身边摆着一个通讯器。索罗蒙被关在旁边的笼子里，他的目光透过铁窗，对塔瑟拉真正的总督怒目而视。当你和格雷托出现时，索罗蒙挺直了腰杆，仿佛一直在等着你回来。他的目光专注地盯着你，慢慢点了点头——他已经做好战斗准备了。{/n}

languages.text: {n}埃が晴れると、見慣れた広間が見えた。道化は恐怖に震えながら、あなた、というより、あなたの肉体が座っている檻のそばに身をかがめていた。あなたの顔は涙で濡れ、唇は切れており、ヴォクスは隣に転がっている。横の檻にはソロモーンが立っており、格子越しにタッセーラの真の統治者を睨みつけている。代理人はあなたとグライトを見つけると背筋を伸ばした。どうやら彼はあなたの帰還をひたすら待っていたようだ。鋭い視線をあなたから逸らさず、ゆっくりとうなずいた—彼は戦う準備ができている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}When the dust clears, you see the familiar hall. The fool is fearfully hunched close to the cage in which you, or rather your body, is sitting. Your face is awash with tears, your lip is split, and a vox lies next to you. In a cage to the side stands Solomorne, glaring through the bars at the true governor of Thassera. Upon seeing you and Glaito, the Proctor straightens. It seems he was just waiting for your return. Without taking his intent gaze from you, he gives you a slow nod: he is ready to fight.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}埃が晴れると、見慣れた広間が見えた。道化は恐怖に震えながら、あなた、というより、あなたの肉体が座っている檻のそばに身をかがめていた。あなたの顔は涙で濡れ、唇は切れており、ヴォクスは隣に転がっている。横の檻にはソロモーンが立っており、格子越しにタッセーラの真の統治者を睨みつけている。代理人はあなたとグライトを見つけると背筋を伸ばした。どうやら彼はあなたの帰還をひたすら待っていたようだ。鋭い視線をあなたから逸らさず、ゆっくりとうなずいた—彼は戦う準備ができている。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Cuando la polvareda se disipa, reconoces la sala. Entre las sombras, los ojos del bufón relucen con maldad al cruzarse con los tuyos. Junto a el está la jaula donde tú, o más bien tu cuerpo, está sentado. Tu rostro está surcado de lágrimas, tienes el labio partido y hay un voco en el suelo junto a ti. En la jaula de al lado está Solomorne, fulminando con la mirada al verdadero gobernador de Thassera desde detrás de los barrotes. Cuando os ve a Glaito y a ti, el Procurador se endereza. Parece que estaba esperando tu regreso. Te mira con determinación y asiente lentamente con la cabeza: está listo para luchar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}When the dust clears, you see the familiar hall. From the shadows, the jester's eyes spark with malice as they meet yours. Behind him stands a cage, in which you, or rather your body, is sitting. Your face is awash with tears, your lip is split, and a vox lies next to you. In another cage to the side stands Solomorne, glaring through the bars at the true governor of Thassera. Upon seeing you and Glaito, the Proctor straightens. It seems he was just waiting for your return. Without taking his intent gaze off you, he gives you a slow nod: he is ready to fight.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Cuando la polvareda se disipa, reconoces la sala. Entre las sombras, los ojos del bufón relucen con maldad al cruzarse con los tuyos. Junto a el está la jaula donde tú, o más bien tu cuerpo, está sentado. Tu rostro está surcado de lágrimas, tienes el labio partido y hay un voco en el suelo junto a ti. En la jaula de al lado está Solomorne, fulminando con la mirada al verdadero gobernador de Thassera desde detrás de los barrotes. Cuando os ve a Glaito y a ti, el Procurador se endereza. Parece que estaba esperando tu regreso. Te mira con determinación y asiente lentamente con la cabeza: está listo para luchar.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Toz dağıldığında salonu görüyorsun. Gözlerinle buluşan soytarının gözleri, kötülükle parıldıyor. Onun ardında senin, daha doğrusu bedeninin oturduğu kafes yer alıyor. Yüzün gözyaşlarıyla ıslanmış, dudağın yarılmış ve yanında bir voks duruyor. Yan taraftaki bir kafeste ise Solomorne dikiliyor, parmaklıkların ardından Thassera'nın gerçek valisine hiddetle bakıyor. Seni ve Glaito'yu gören Üsteğmen doğruluyor. Sanki sadece senin dönmeni bekliyormuş gibi görünüyor. Keskin bakışlarını senden ayırmadan başıyla yavaşça bir işaret veriyor: Dövüşmeye hazır.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}When the dust clears, you see the familiar hall. From the shadows, the jester's eyes spark with malice as they meet yours. Behind him stands a cage, in which you, or rather your body, is sitting. Your face is awash with tears, your lip is split, and a vox lies next to you. In another cage to the side stands Solomorne, glaring through the bars at the true governor of Thassera. Upon seeing you and Glaito, the Proctor straightens. It seems he was just waiting for your return. Without taking his intent gaze off you, he gives you a slow nod: he is ready to fight.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Toz dağıldığında salonu görüyorsun. Gözlerinle buluşan soytarının gözleri, kötülükle parıldıyor. Onun ardında senin, daha doğrusu bedeninin oturduğu kafes yer alıyor. Yüzün gözyaşlarıyla ıslanmış, dudağın yarılmış ve yanında bir voks duruyor. Yan taraftaki bir kafeste ise Solomorne dikiliyor, parmaklıkların ardından Thassera'nın gerçek valisine hiddetle bakıyor. Seni ve Glaito'yu gören Üsteğmen doğruluyor. Sanki sadece senin dönmeni bekliyormuş gibi görünüyor. Keskin bakışlarını senden ayırmadan başıyla yavaşça bir işaret veriyor: Dövüşmeye hazır.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Quand le nuage se dissipe, vous reconnaissez la salle. Dans la pénombre, vous croisez le regard pétillant de malveillance du bouffon, posté devant une cage dans laquelle est assis votre corps. Votre visage est baigné de larmes, votre lèvre fendue, et un vox se trouve à vos côtés. Solomorne est enfermé dans une autre cage à proximité, d'où il foudroie du regard le vrai gouverneur de Thassera. En vous voyant avec Glaito, le proctor se redresse, comme s'il avait attendu votre retour. Sans vous quitter du regard, il vous fait un lent signe de la tête : il est prêt à combattre.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}When the dust clears, you see the familiar hall. From the shadows, the jester's eyes spark with malice as they meet yours. Behind him stands a cage, in which you, or rather your body, is sitting. Your face is awash with tears, your lip is split, and a vox lies next to you. In another cage to the side stands Solomorne, glaring through the bars at the true governor of Thassera. Upon seeing you and Glaito, the Proctor straightens. It seems he was just waiting for your return. Without taking his intent gaze off you, he gives you a slow nod: he is ready to fight.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Quand le nuage se dissipe, vous reconnaissez la salle. Dans la pénombre, vous croisez le regard pétillant de malveillance du bouffon, posté devant une cage dans laquelle est assis votre corps. Votre visage est baigné de larmes, votre lèvre fendue, et un vox se trouve à vos côtés. Solomorne est enfermé dans une autre cage à proximité, d'où il foudroie du regard le vrai gouverneur de Thassera. En vous voyant avec Glaito, le proctor se redresse, comme s'il avait attendu votre retour. Sans vous quitter du regard, il vous fait un lent signe de la tête : il est prêt à combattre.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Als sich der Staub legt, siehst du die vertraute Halle. In den Schatten funkeln die boshaften Augen des Narren, als sie deinen Blick treffen. Hinter ihm steht ein Käfig, in dem du – oder vielmehr dein Körper – sitzt. Dein Gesicht ist tränenüberströmt, deine Lippe gespalten. Neben dir liegt ein Vox. In einem weiteren Käfig steht Solomorne, der den wahren Gouverneur von Thassera durch die Gitterstäbe anfunkelt. Als er dich und Glaito sieht, richtet sich der Proktor auf. Er scheint auf deine Rückkehr gewartet zu haben. Ohne seinen intensiven Blick von dir abzuwenden, nickt er dir unmerklich zu. Er ist kampfbereit.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}When the dust clears, you see the familiar hall. From the shadows, the jester's eyes spark with malice as they meet yours. Behind him stands a cage, in which you, or rather your body, is sitting. Your face is awash with tears, your lip is split, and a vox lies next to you. In another cage to the side stands Solomorne, glaring through the bars at the true governor of Thassera. Upon seeing you and Glaito, the Proctor straightens. It seems he was just waiting for your return. Without taking his intent gaze off you, he gives you a slow nod: he is ready to fight.{/n}
